CustomField.description: The image defined in this field appears in the lefthand side of the navbar in the microsite. Recommended size 90px by 90px. (Image will be cropped to these dimensions)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The image defined in this field appears in the lefthand side of the navbar in the microsite. Recommended size 90px by 90px. (Image will be cropped to these dimensions)
CustomField.label: Logo Image URL
